subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: With five days to prepare for the World Series, the Tigers are trying to stay sharp. The 2006 Tigers had six days to prepare for the Cardinals and they looked more rusty than rested.
snippet: With five days to prepare for the World Series, the Tigers are trying to stay sharp. The 2006 Tigers had six days to prepare for the Cardinals and they looked more rusty than rested.
